control.name: 3.6.1 - Generate strong cryptographic keys
control.desc: The encryption solution must generate strong keys, as defined in the PCI DSS and PA-DSS Glossary of Terms, Abbreviations, and Acronyms under "Cryptographic Key Generation." Use of strong cryptographic keys significantly increases the level of security of encrypted cardholder data.

test.steps:
3.6.1.a Verify that key-management procedures specify how to generate strong keys.

3.6.1.b Observe the procedures for generating keys to verify that strong keys are generated.
